message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair starting point considering the potential benefits it holds for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'm getting from the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value this product brings to the table is substantial, and I believe $900,000 is a more accurate reflection of its worth.  Would you be willing to meet me at this price point?

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not convinced that $900,000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm proposing $925,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
